description: Single storey rear extensions (following part demolition of existing rear addition); conversion of a garage into a habitable room including associated external alteration involving installation of windows to side and front elevation
application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s):  116c_CR-P.S.P. Proposed site Plan

116c_CR-P.P.00-Opt.3 Proposed Ground Floor Option 3-Rev A, 116c_CR-P.P.03 Proposed Roof Plan-Rev A,116c_CR-P.E.01 Proposed Front Elevation-Rev A, 116c_CR-P.E.02 Proposed Rear Elevation-Rev A, 116c_CR-P.E.03 Proposed Side Elevation-Rev A, 116c_CR-P.E.04 Proposed Side Elevation-Rev A and 116c_CR-P.S.01 Proposed Section 01-Rev A
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.

| The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing, unless where stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Policies HC1, D3 & D4 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies 7.4, 7.6 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), policies 1.1 (k) and 1.2 (f) of the adopted Development (Core) Strategy (2012).
| No part of the flat roof of the hereby approved development shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policies 7A ,7B and 7D of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013), policy D3 of the London Plan (2021) and National Planning Policy Framework 2021 - section 12.
